Karaoke Test

The two new members performed their best
with nervousness in front of the staff
and the members.
First of all...

I'm Emma, 14 years old. I'm going to
sing Marigold by Aimyon.

Emma chose her favorite karaoke song,
Marigold by Aimyon.

The wind is strong, it shakes my heart a
little
I miss you who looked at me seriously
You are shining in front of me
I'm happy
I'm happy

You with the hat look like a swaying
marigold

That is the sky is still blue, the
summer
The love of that day that I laughed at
Don't leave me anymore
I'm looking at you with tears in my eyes
With a gentle cloud-like warmth
I'll hold you tight and never let go
I, I, I love you

I don't have enough words to say, so
kiss me
The clouds still leave their shadows
I'll never, never let you go
I won't let go of you forever and ever
Thank you very much
Next is

I will sing Yorushika's Tadakimi ni Hare

which she thought was the best fit for
her voice
I remember you from that summer

The scent of summer stroking my cheeks
Until I become an adult

cake

I'll surely, surely remember

to catch up
The night blooms in your pocket
I can't say it out loud, I'm alone
If that's okay, I'll give up
Thank you for watching!
Please subscribe to my channel!
Thank you very much.
